name: GCP Kubernetes Engine Clusters have Stackdriver Monitoring disabled
description: This policy identifies Kubernetes Engine Clusters which have disabled Stackdriver monitoring. Enabling Stackdriver monitoring will let the Kubernetes Engine to monitor signals and build operations in the clusters.
searchModel.query: config from cloud.resource where cloud.type = 'gcp' AND api.name = 'gcloud-container-describe-clusters' AND json.rule = 'monitoringService does not exist or monitoringService equals none'
recommendation:
1. Login to GCP Portal
2. Go to Kubernetes Engine (Left Panel)
3. Select Kubernetes clusters 
4. From the list of clusters, choose the reported cluster
5. Click on EDIT button
6. Set 'Stackdriver Monitoring' to Enabled
7. Click on Save
